question: You recently took a trip with a taxi company. The driver behaved in an unacceptable way and you had a lot of problems. You complained to the company but no-one has replied to your complaint.Write a letter to the taxi company. In your lettersay why you are writing and how you feelexplain what happenedtell them what you would like them to do.
text: I am writing to complain against the misbehaviour of your cab driver who was assigned for my last week's trip from Delhi to Ghaziabad. Although I have raised this issue with the company on the very next day but till now I have not received any response from them.
I am a regular customer of your cab services but this time, I am extremely displeased with the addressal of my issue. It does not feel safe to me booking any further ride in future.

Not only the driver arrived late at the pick-up point but also on asking the reason, he replied in an angirly manner and started driving rashly to scare me off. I warned him to raise a formal complaint but to my surprise he remained ignorant and kept on arguing throughout the ride. I called your customer care instantly but nobody picked the call then. Thus, I had to record and send the message to an automatic message reciever bot of your company.

I would like you to take action against the driver promptly as it could put travellers on risk. Moreover, as a suggestion please create a proper forum for the clients to raise their issues and to provide updates on the statuses. This way customers will have more faith with your services.
